Label.en: I’m sure you’ve seen a sphinx before… but take a look at this monstrosity:
Label.fr: I’m sure you’ve seen a sphinx before… but take a look at this monstrosity:
Label.es: I’m sure you’ve seen a sphinx before… but take a look at this monstrosity:

Label.en: It’s a Lamassu! A winged bull-man! Don’t be afraid though, they’re good guys! Their name means ‘protective spirit’ in Akkadian.
Label.fr: It’s a Lamassu! A winged bull-man! Don’t be afraid though, they’re good guys! Their name means ‘protective spirit’ in Akkadian.
